product1_electronics.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
product1_electronics.description: Latest flagship smartphone with 200MP camera, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, 12GB RAM, 256GB storage. Features include 6.8 inch Dynamic AMOLED display, 5000mAh battery with fast charging.

product2_clothing.title: Men's Cotton Casual T-Shirt
product2_clothing.description: Premium quality 100% cotton t-shirt, perfect for casual wear. Soft fabric, breathable, and comfortable fit. Available in multiple colors.

product3_furniture.title: Modern Wooden Study Table
product3_furniture.description: Sturdy wooden study table with drawers. Perfect for home office or student room. Includes cable management system and spacious surface area.

product4_shoes.title: Nike Air Max 270 Running Shoes
product4_shoes.description: Premium running shoes with Air Max cushioning technology. Lightweight, breathable, and designed for maximum comfort during workouts.
